issue.title: How to replay logs from cloudsim?

content.raw:
hmm regarding the slow playback speed, you can try playing back using this [log playback sdf](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/ign-gazebo2/examples/worlds/log_playback.sdf) file. First edit LogPlayback plugin’s `<path>` to from `/tmp/log` to the path of the directory containing the state log. Then add this configuration to the sdf file \(right after the LogPlayback plugin\) to step the simulation playback with a `0.004` step size:

‌

```
    <physics name="1ms" type="dart">
      <max_step_size>0.004</max_step_size>
      <real_time_factor>1.0</real_time_factor>
    </physics>
```

To launch the playback, run :

```
ign gazebo -v 4 log_playback.sdf
```

see if that helps

hmm regarding the slow playback speed, you can try playing back using this log playback sdf file. First edit LogPlayback plugin’s <path> to from /tmp/log to the path of the directory containing the state log. Then add this configuration to the sdf file (right after the LogPlayback plugin) to step the simulation playback with a 0.004 step size:

‌

    <physics name="1ms" type="dart">
      <max_step_size>0.004</max_step_size>
      <real_time_factor>1.0</real_time_factor>
    </physics>

To launch the playback, run :

see if that helps
